text: Rachel Maddow recently became the highest - rated cable news host. On “ The Late Show, ” she told Stephen Colbert that she had begun to feel the Trump administration may have lost some of its ability to manipulate the media. “ With this trip, The Washington Post announces Friday night that there ’ s a significant ‘ person of interest ’ working actively in the White House as a senior adviser to the president. And so now we ’ re trying to figure out who the person of interest is in this F. B. I. probe who ’ s currently working in the White House and isn ’ t one of the people who ’ s on the trip with him — and then mysteriously Reince Priebus and Steve Bannon got sent home early today.
